title: Australian diary. No. 035
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
brief_description: The rapid growth of the city of Mackay, on the coast of Queensland; a farm which, as well as ducks, breeds stud geese; a model of a building made from marble by a Gundagai man; Australian sailing-boats and the Sydney to Hobart race as the highlight of the season.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
